org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Class EncryptionZoneManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.EncryptionZoneManager

  • public class EncryptionZoneManager
extends Object
    Manages the list of encryption zones in the filesystem.

    The EncryptionZoneManager has its own lock, but relies on the FSDirectory lock being held for many operations. The FSDirectory lock should not be taken if the manager lock is already held.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  EncryptionZoneManager.EncryptionZoneInt
      EncryptionZoneInt is the internal representation of an encryption zone.

    • Method Detail

      • addEncryptionZone

        void addEncryptionZone(Long inodeId,
                     org.apache.hadoop.crypto.CipherSuite suite,
                     org.apache.hadoop.crypto.CryptoProtocolVersion version,
                     String keyName)
        Add a new encryption zone.

        Called while holding the FSDirectory lock.

        Parameters:
        inodeId - of the encryption zone
        keyName - encryption zone key name

      • unprotectedAddEncryptionZone

        void unprotectedAddEncryptionZone(Long inodeId,
                                org.apache.hadoop.crypto.CipherSuite suite,
                                org.apache.hadoop.crypto.CryptoProtocolVersion version,
                                String keyName)
        Add a new encryption zone.

        Does not assume that the FSDirectory lock is held.

        Parameters:
        inodeId - of the encryption zone
        keyName - encryption zone key name

      • removeEncryptionZone

        void removeEncryptionZone(Long inodeId)
        Remove an encryption zone.

        Called while holding the FSDirectory lock.

      • isInAnEZ

        boolean isInAnEZ(INodesInPath iip)
           throws org.apache.hadoop.fs.UnresolvedLinkException,
                  SnapshotAccessControlException
        Returns true if an IIP is within an encryption zone.

        Called while holding the FSDirectory lock.

        Throws:
        org.apache.hadoop.fs.UnresolvedLinkException
        SnapshotAccessControlException

      • getFullPathName

        private String getFullPathName(EncryptionZoneManager.EncryptionZoneInt ezi)
        Returns the path of the EncryptionZoneInt.

        Called while holding the FSDirectory lock.

      • getKeyName

        String getKeyName(INodesInPath iip)
        Get the key name for an encryption zone. Returns null if iip is not within an encryption zone.

        Called while holding the FSDirectory lock.

      • getEncryptionZoneForPath

        private EncryptionZoneManager.EncryptionZoneInt getEncryptionZoneForPath(INodesInPath iip)
        Looks up the EncryptionZoneInt for a path within an encryption zone. Returns null if path is not within an EZ.

        Must be called while holding the manager lock.

      • getEZINodeForPath

        EncryptionZone getEZINodeForPath(INodesInPath iip)
        Returns an EncryptionZone representing the ez for a given path. Returns an empty marker EncryptionZone if path is not in an ez.
        Parameters:
        iip - The INodesInPath of the path to check
        Returns:
        the EncryptionZone representing the ez for the path.

      • checkMoveValidity

        void checkMoveValidity(INodesInPath srcIIP,
                     INodesInPath dstIIP,
                     String src)
                 throws IOException
        Throws an exception if the provided path cannot be renamed into the destination because of differing encryption zones.

        Called while holding the FSDirectory lock.

        Parameters:
        srcIIP - source IIP
        dstIIP - destination IIP
        src - source path, used for debugging
        Throws:
        IOException - if the src cannot be renamed to the dst

      • createEncryptionZone

                         org.apache.hadoop.crypto.CipherSuite suite,
                         org.apache.hadoop.crypto.CryptoProtocolVersion version,
                         String keyName)
                     throws IOException
        Create a new encryption zone.

        Called while holding the FSDirectory lock.

        Throws:
